quote: As you know, I've been a big critic of China, and I've been talking about currency manipulation for a long time. But I have to tell you that during the election, number one, they stopped.
quotePlain: As you know, I’ve been a big critic of China, and I’ve been talking about currency manipulation for a long time. But I have to tell you that during the election, number one, they stopped.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: China stopped manipulating its currency well before Trump ever announced he was running for president.
checks.quotePlain: China stopped manipulating its currency well before Trump ever announced he was running for president.

claims.title: Trump got China to stop manipulating their currency
claims.negative: Trump didn't get China to stop manipulating their currency
claims.negativePlain: Trump didn’t get China to stop manipulating their currency
